headline.main: Question of War Viewed as Problem for Expert Strategists, but Each of Us Must Share Responsibility for Achievement of Main Purpose

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: The current of history flows swiftly and one cannot be sure that what one writes on Monday will not be out of date on Sunday or that one's morning table-talk will not be out of date at dinner. We must think, if we think at all, as we go.
abstract: Lrs on U S role and war declaration
